ygData.subject: Re: Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that the bards in the back room of the guild hall sell a smattering of songs. I know that the 8th level song, Lament, is only available in Kelethin
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that the bards in the back room of the guild hall sell a
smattering of songs. I know that the 8th level song, Lament, is only
available in Kelethin as is 11 and 13 I think. A few higher level songs seem
available at all bard guilds but most of them will be hidden in other remote
places.

Sure, tehre are some lists around on the internet listing the locations of
most of the songs but I think it is more fun to ask fellow bards in-game
where they might be.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Heather [mailto:heathers24@...]
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 7:50 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Songs


From: Heather <heathers24@...>

Hello all,

I am new to this list and have read two digests so far. I just reached
8th level a few days ago and was curious about a few things.
My bardess resides in Kelethin and the guild there only sells songs up to
the
7th level song. I am curious as to where I would obtain the rest of the
songs.
Not sure where to start looking for them or if they are quests. The guild
leader
in Kelethin only gives out drums for four spiderling silks.

I would like for the information either on the list or emailed to me
directly

Thanks in advance,

Kristin- Wood elf of Kelethin
8th level Bardess
